    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <title>
            <string language="ca">M'endevines?</string>
            <string language="en">Can you guess?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Können Sie schätzen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pouvez-vous deviner ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pode você supo?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potete indovinare?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπορείτε να υποθέσετε;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recull d'endevinalles agrupades en quatre nivells de dificultat. S'ha de resoldre l'endevinalla i escriure'n la solució.
Es poden llegir, escoltar i imprimir.</string>
            <string language="en">A collection of riddles grouped into four levels of difficulty. Viewers must solve the riddle and write the solution. They can be read, heard and printed.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">atenció</string>
            <string language="en">attention</string>
            <string language="es">atención</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">pensament lògic</string>
            <string language="en">logical thinking</string>
            <string language="es">pensamiento lógico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">percepció</string>
            <string language="en">perception</string>
            <string language="es">percepción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">preescriptura</string>
            <string language="en">pre-writing</string>
            <string language="es">preescritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">raonament</string>
            <string language="en">reasoning</string>
            <string language="es">razonamiento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escriptura</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="es">escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung Rätsel gruppiert in vier Stufen 
Schwierigkeit. Projektoren müssen das Rätsel lösen und die 
Lösung schreiben. Sie können gelesen werden, gehört werden 
und gedruckt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection d'énigmes groupée dans quatre niveaux de 
difficulté. Les visualisateurs doivent résoudre l'énigme et 
écrire la solution. Ils peuvent être lus, entendus et 
imprimés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção dos riddles agrupada em quatro níveis da 
dificuldade. Os visores devem resolver o riddle e escrever a 
solução. Podem ser lidos, ouvido e imprimido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di riddles raggruppata in quattro livelli 
della difficoltà. I visori devono risolvere il riddle e 
scrivere la soluzione. Possono essere letti, sentiti e stampati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των αινιγμάτων που ομαδοποιούνται σε 
τέσσερα επίπεδα δυσκολίας. Οι εμφανίσεις πρέπει να λύσουν 
το αίνιγμα και να γράψουν τη λύση. Μπορούν να διαβαστούν, 
να ακουστούν και να τυπωθούν.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufmerksamkeit</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">logisches Denken</string>
